name: Amber Vittoria x MoonPay Art Week 2022

metadata.name: I Am In Your Dream
metadata.description: Amber Vittoria’s abstracted work draws on her relationship to femininity, emotion, and identity. This is a 1/1 where the primary collector receives the physical 11 x 14” painting. The poem for this piece is: “I Am In Your Dream” / And you in mine, / Celebrating what life is / Like in a parallel time. The artwork listed is indeed authentic, created by, and copyright to artist Amber Vittoria; the purchase of this NFT is a purchase of the asset, not of the copyright.
